metadata.Title: CVE-2023-22048 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Pluggable Auth). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.33and prior. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows low privilegedattacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQLServer. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorizedread access to a subset of MySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.1 BaseScore 3.1 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
